title: How Phoenix rallied past No. 1 seed Minnesota in OT to win an instant classic
content: Phoenix overcame a 20-point deficit to stun Minnesota in overtime and knot their WNBA semifinal series.

title: AD: Gundy exit in best interest of OSU long term
content: Hours after Oklahoma State announced the firing of longtime football coach Mike Gundy amid a 1-2 start, athletic director Chad Weiberg emphasized the decision was made with the "best interest of moving the program forward in the long term."

title: Skubal, Tigers collapse; caught by Guardians
content: Ace Tarik Skubal fell apart on the mound in Cleveland on Tuesday night and Detroit lost its seventh straight game, allowing the Guardians to catch the Tigers in the standings and secure the tiebreaker.

title: Mercury match WNBA history with Game 2 rally
content: The Phoenix Mercury posted an 89-83 overtime victory over the Minnesota Lynx at Target Center Tuesday night, tying the WNBA record for largest road comeback in the postseason, matching the Chicago's Sky's 20-point rally against the Atlanta Dream in 2014.

title: Aces heed call to get 'feisty,' tie series in blowout
content: After a disappointing Game 1, the Aces ramped up their intensity in a 22-point blowout of the Fever to even the series Tuesday night.

title: Surging Mariners secure one clinch, eye 'big one'
content: A come-from-behind victory over the Rockies on Tuesday night sent the Mariners back into the postseason and put them on the cusp of a long-awaited division title.

title: Parsons on sacking Dak: 'It's going to be painful'
content: Sacking Dak Prescott would be bittersweet for Micah Parsons, who told The Associated Press that sacking his former teammate and mentor is "going to be painful."

title: Mets win thriller, retake control of last wild card
content: Playoff baseball is already here for the Mets, who rallied from a 6-1 deficit to defeat the Cubs 9-7 on Tuesday and leap back into the sixth slot in the NL playoff pecking order.

title: Caballero's walk-off seals Yanks' 60th playoff berth
content: José Caballero, acquired at the trade deadline to provide a versatile spark off the bench, swatted a two-out, walk-off single in the ninth inning Tuesday night against the White Sox to secure the Yankees their 60th postseason berth in franchise history.

title: 📈 NFL Power Rankings: Defensive issues
content: We stacked every NFL team ahead of Week 4. Who jumped up our 1-32 list? Plus, let's pick out the biggest defensive concerns for each roster.

title: 'Everybody's waiting for that moment': Ohtani gets set for his first two-way October
content: Whether he starts Game 1 on the mound or pitches in relief, Shohei Ohtani is primed to make even more history.

title: NBA Rank 2025 is here! Which players made the cut in Nos. 100 to 51
content: We're counting down the top 100 players in the league for the 2025-26 season. What players broke into Nos. 100 to 51?

title: NBA Rank: Which 10 players can make a jump into the top 100 next year?
content: ESPN analyst Kevin Pelton takes a look at which players could join the list next season after falling short this year.

title: Ranking every player in the 2025 Ryder Cup, from Scheffler to McIlroy to Højgaard
content: Team USA and Europe will meet at Bethpage Black for Ryder Cup bragging rights. We're breaking down every player competing in this year's tournament.

title: Jeff Passan's 2025 MLB regular-season awards
content: Forget the MVP and Cy Young Award races -- it's time for our fun and wide-ranging regular-season annual accolades.

title: Mike Gundy is out at Oklahoma State: Top candidates, transfers, recruits to watch
content: Gundy's long tenure in Stillwater is over. Who replaces the Pokes legend and who are the key players on the roster?

title: CFP Bubble Watch: A look at every Power 4 team
content: Putting the spotlight on select teams and questions around others as the early playoff picture takes shape.

title: What's next for New York Liberty after firing Sandy Brondello?
content: Sandy Brondello seemingly had support from her players, but she's out after four seasons, including the 2024 WNBA title.

title: Isak's first Liverpool goal could be the start of something special
content: It may have been another disjointed display from Liverpool on Tuesday, but it was also another win. Add to that Alexander Isak's first goal for the club, and it's no wonder Arne Slot seems pleased.

title: Six fighters earn contracts on Week 7 of 'Dana White's Contender Series'
content: "Dana White's Contender Series" continues to prove it's a fruitful path to fighting in the UFC. Find out which fighters can earn a contract this week.

title: Early men's Bracketology: Houston stays No. 1, Virginia gives ACC hope
content: The new Cavaliers coach is tasked with winning as big as the coach he once beat in a historic upset. Can it be done in Year 1?

title: What Bruce Pearl's retirement means for Auburn, college basketball
content: The Tigers' winningest coach is retiring. Here's what that means with 42 days until the 2025-26 season.

title: Our NFL trade grades: Should Titans have gotten more for Jarvis Brownlee Jr.?
content: We're grading NFL deals leading into the Nov. 4 NFL trade deadline, including the Jets picking up Brownlee from Tennessee.

title: Pickups: Trey Benson next man up; Raiders' offense still has value
content: Highlighting available free agent options after yet another injury-filled weekend, as well as other helpful options ahead of Week 4.

title: Buzz: Jaxson Dart could revitalize Nabers, key Giants players' fantasy outlooks
content: Eric Moody on why Malik Nabers may be the biggest winner of the Giants' move to rookie QB Jaxson Dart.

title: Offseason survey: Best and worst moves, LeBron's future and Finals picks
content: League insiders share their picks for the Finals, most head-scratching moves of the summer and LeBron's next decision.

title: Jaylen Brown speaks at Bill Nye's Hollywood star dedication
content: The duo first connected in November 2024 after Brown expressed an interest on social media in meeting Nye.

title: Big questions: Have Lions' coordinators found their groove? How concerning is Cowboys' D?
content: NFL Nation reporters react to all the action, answering the biggest questions coming out of each game.

title: From designer clutches to grocery bags: Inside soccer's toiletry bag obsession
content: Toiletry bags are soccer players' fashion statements, and the stars of MLS opened theirs up and showed ESPN what's inside.

title: Why Dembélé's Ballon d'Or win over Yamal feels like the dawn of a new era
content: Ousmane Dembélé and Lamine Yamal, this year's top two in the Ballon d'Or voting, have a lot in common when it comes to how their energetic, attacking play is a welcome antidote in the tactics-driven world of modern soccer.

title: Men's divisional rankings: Liam Paro wins, enters welterweight rankings
content: Liam Paro cracks the top 10 in a new division following a decision win over David Papot. Here are the latest ESPN rankings in all weight classes.

title: Women's divisional rankings: Kaye Scott enters top 5 at 160 pounds
content: Kaye Scott makes her debut at middleweight, and Jelena Mrdjenovich enters the top 5 at junior featherweight.

title: WNBA playoff schedule: Fever, Lynx take 1-0 leads in semifinals
content: The 2025 WNBA semifinals are underway, and Phoenix beat Minnesota in OT in an instant classic Tuesday.

title: Betting buzz: Mendoza, Beck, Moore top three Heisman favorites after Mateer injury
content: Following the news of John Mateer's hand injury, Indiana QB Fernando Mendoza is the new Heisman favorite.

title: College football betting: Is it time to buy into Fernando Mendoza and the Hoosiers?
content: As the odds shift for the Heisman Trophy and national championship, Pamela Maldonado explains how to bet.

title: 'Was depressed for 6 yrs': When 2 Punjab brothers hid in plane landing gear; one lived to tell the tale
content: A 13-year-old Afghan boy triggered a security alert at Delhi Airport after stowing away in the landing gear of a Kam Air flight from Kabul. Discovered upon arrival, he had journeyed without a ticket. The incident echoes a tragic 1996 event where two brothers attempted a similar feat, resulting in one brother's death from hypothermia during a flight to London.

title: '50 meters deep': Video shows massive sinkhole in Bangkok swallowing cars, poles
content: A road in Bangkok collapsed on Wednesday, creating a 50-meter sinkhole due to ongoing underground construction. The collapse, captured on video, swallowed a car and an electric pole. Bangkok's governor, Chadchart Sittipunt, attributed the incident to soil flowing into the tunnel, causing the road surface to give way, raising concerns about the city's infrastructure projects.

title: 'AIMIM ready for alliance with RJD': Owaisi demands 6 Bihar seats
content: Asaduddin Owaisi's AIMIM has offered an alliance to Tejashwi Yadav's RJD ahead of the Bihar Assembly elections, formally requesting inclusion in the Mahagathbandhan. Owaisi, during his 'Seemanchal Nyay Yatra,' emphasized AIMIM's demand for six seats, warning of potential consequences if their proposal is rejected.

title: 'Didn’t want to be doctor': Maharashtra teen with NEET rank 1475th dies by suicide
content: Anurag Anil Borkar, a 19-year-old NEET qualifier from Maharashtra, tragically ended his life, revealing in a suicide note his lack of interest in pursuing a medical career. Despite securing a good rank and preparing for MBBS in Gorakhpur, he expressed a desire to enter the business field. Police are currently investigating the circumstances surrounding his death.

title: Google to engineers: AI is everywhere; skills must go beyond coding
content: Google's Ryan J. Salva emphasizes AI's central role in software development, with adoption surging to 90% among professionals. Developers are dedicating approximately two hours daily to AI tools, shifting their focus from raw coding to product design and problem-solving. While coding proficiency remains crucial, AI lowers barriers, enabling broader participation in software building and deployment.

title: New record! Vaibhav Sooryavanshi hits six sixes, marks another Youth ODIs milestone
content: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi, the Indian teenage cricket prodigy, has shattered Unmukt Chand's record for the most sixes in Youth ODI history, reaching 41 sixes in just 10 innings. The 14-year-old's achievement came during a match against Australia U-19 in Brisbane.

title: From molestation to fraud: Old cases against Delhi institute director resurface
content: Chinmayanad Saraswati, director of a Delhi engineering institute, faces renewed sexual harassment allegations from students. Accused of harassing 12-15 students with abusive messages and unwanted contact, Saraswati is currently absconding. Police are reviewing past complaints from 2009 and 2016. Investigations revealed a luxury car with a forged UN number plate. Sri Sharada Peetham has disavowed Saraswati, condemning his actions.

title: Shawls, sculptures and more: Gifts received by PM Modi up for auction
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has encouraged citizens to participate in the 7th edition of the PM's Mementoes E-Auction, featuring gifts received during official events. The auction, running from September 17 to October 2, 2025, offers over 1,300 items, including art, sculptures, and sports memorabilia. Proceeds will support the Namami Gange Project, dedicated to cleaning and conserving the Ganga River.

title: Jeff Bezos’ father hunts CEO: Family fortune at stake; multi-billion job open
content: Mike Bezos, father of Amazon's Jeff Bezos, is seeking a CEO for his family office, Aurora Borealis, amidst growing wealth complexities. Based in Miami, Aurora Borealis manages investments, philanthropy, and estate planning. This move signals a shift towards a more institutional structure, mirroring practices of other billionaire families.

title: Sensex at 94,000 by 2026-end? HSBC upgrades India to ‘Overweight’
content: HSBC has upgraded India's equities rating to 'Overweight', projecting a Sensex target of 94,000 by 2026, indicating a 13% potential increase. This decision is driven by appealing valuations, supportive government policies, and consistent domestic investor engagement.

title: Arizona special election: Who is Adelita Grijalva; wins seat, becomes first Latina in Congress
content: Adelita Grijalva, daughter of the late US Representative Raúl Grijalva, has won the special election in Arizona's 7th Congressional District. Securing a decisive victory over Republican Daniel Butierez, Grijalva becomes the first Latina to represent Arizona in Congress. She pledges to prioritize environmental justice, health care, and curbing presidential tariff authority, strengthening the Democratic position in the House.

title: US tightens visa rules: Interview waivers end from Oct 1; here’s what students should know
content: Starting October 1, 2025, the U.S. ends broad visa interview waivers for international students and professionals. Only select categories, like certain diplomatic or B-1/B-2/H-2A renewals, qualify. Students and workers may face longer consulate waits and required in-person interviews. Planning ahead, checking embassy guidance, and preparing documentation is essential as visa scrutiny increases.

title: ‘We need the brightest minds’: Nvidia, OpenAI CEO defend H‑1B fee; warns US
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang and OpenAI CEO Sam Altman have both expressed concerns over the recent H-1B visa fee hike, emphasizing the importance of attracting global talent to the U.S. Huang highlighted immigration as the foundation of the American Dream, while Altman focused on streamlining the process to secure the smartest individuals.

title: R Ashwin's next T20 franchise unveiled, to bowl alongside a Pakistani player
content: Ravichandran Ashwin, the veteran Indian spinner, is set to make history by joining the Sydney Thunder in the upcoming Big Bash League season. Following his retirement from the IPL, Cricket Australia secured Ashwin's participation, marking the first time a high-profile Indian player will feature in the tournament. His inclusion is expected to boost viewership and strengthen the Thunder's spin attack.

title: 'Not like Russia & China': Finland hails India as 'emerging superpower'
content: Finland's President Alexander Stubb has distinguished India from Russia and China, recognising India as an emerging superpower and advocating for stronger Western engagement. He emphasised India's geopolitical stake in resolving the Russia-Ukraine conflict and its potential role in peace negotiations. Stubb also supports strengthening India-Finland ties through cooperation in technology and trade.

title: After mimicking each other, Abrar and Hasaranga came face-to-face - here's what happened
content: In a captivating Asia Cup Super 4s encounter, Sri Lanka faced elimination as Wanindu Hasaranga and Pakistan's Abrar Ahmed playfully mimicked each other's celebrations, showcasing sportsmanship with a post-match hug. Despite the loss, Pakistan's captain, Salman Agha, lauded his team's fielding improvements and Abrar's reliability. Pakistan now faces a crucial match against Bangladesh to stay in the finals race.

title: Adani calls Hindenburg report ‘challenge’ to Indian enterprises; what he said
content: In a letter to shareholders, Gautam Adani has asserted that the Hindenburg report, intended to weaken his group, has instead fortified its foundations and resolve. SEBI's investigation found no evidence of fraudulent transactions or violations of listing agreements, providing Adani with a clean chit.

title: Is Sanju Samson the weakest link in India’s middle order?
content: Sanju Samson scored a scratchy 45-ball 56 on a sluggish Abu Dhabi pitch against Oman and looked all at sea during his 17-ball stay at the crease against Pakistan in Dubai. He struggles when the ball gets soft, and with Jitesh Sharma waiting in the wings, it will be interesting to see how long India persist with Sanju Samson.

title: 'He did his best to cancel me': Kimmel returns to ABC with fiery speech; takes dig at Trump
content: Jimmy Kimmel returned to Jimmy Kimmel Live! after a brief suspension, apologizing for comments regarding Charlie Kirk's murder, emphasizing it was not his intention to make light of the situation. He expressed gratitude for the support he received and defended free speech, warning against government censorship. Kimmel also thanked ABC for his reinstatement and praised Kirk's widow for her grace.

title: 'Used car with fake UN number plate': Institute manager accused of molesting 15 girls
content: Delhi Police have registered a case against Chinmayanad Saraswati, manager of a Vasant Kunj engineering institution, for allegedly molesting around 15 female students. The case was filed after victims provided statements at Vasant Kunj North Police Station. Saraswati, also known as Parthasarthi, is currently at large. Authorities impounded his luxury car, discovering it had a fake UN registration.

title: Charlie Kirk killing: Tyler Robinson's trans partner allegedly flees Utah home
content: Lance Twiggs, the transgender partner of Tyler Robinson, has disappeared from their Utah home following the alleged murder of Charlie Kirk. Twiggs, who was cooperating with investigators and received threats, was last known to be in a safe location. The disappearance adds another layer of mystery to the case, leaving the community in shock and with unanswered questions.

title: 'Can't imagine': Ukrainian woman opens up after getting married to Indian man
content: Viktoriia Chakraborty, a Ukrainian woman married to an Indian man, is winning hearts online by embracing Indian culture. After living in India for eight years, she shared her experiences of adopting local customs, including wearing sarees and eating with her hands. Viktoriia's Instagram video showcasing her love for Indian traditions has gone viral, with many praising her integration and happiness.

title: Game-day glam: Jahmyr Gibbs’ girlfriend stuns fans with chic outfit - see pics
content: Nicole Anderson, Jahmyr Gibbs' girlfriend, showcased her stylish game-day outfit on Instagram, blending Detroit Lions pride with chic streetwear. She paired a Lions hoodie and cap with a cream mini skirt, creating a standout fashion statement. Fans praised her unique blend of team spirit and style, making her a fashion inspiration for football fans.

title: Record cargoes: Russia’s crude exports climb to 16-month highs
content: Russian crude oil exports have surged to a 16-month high, reaching 3.62 million barrels daily, even as Ukrainian drone attacks cripple domestic refineries. This increase is partly fueled by OPEC+ agreements allowing higher production and the redirection of crude to export terminals due to refinery disruptions.

title: Itni shiddat se…’: KKR pays tribute to SRK; star wins big at National Awards
content: Shah Rukh Khan's recent National Film Award win for Jawan has sparked celebrations, with his cricket team, KKR, offering a heartfelt tribute referencing his iconic Om Shanti Om dialogue. Gauri Khan also lauded SRK's dedication and announced plans to design a special display for the award. He will next be seen in Siddharth Anand's King.

title: ‘Have to do everything not to’: Zelenskyy’s measured message on India buying Russian oil
content: Ukraine President Zelenskyy expressed optimism that stronger Western-Indian relations could sway New Delhi away from Russian oil. He urged the West to deepen strategic ties with India, believing diplomatic efforts could alter India's energy sourcing approach. While noting past energy import concerns, Zelenskyy voiced confidence in managing these issues and highlighted India's potential as a strategic partner.

title: Who stopped Trump & Melania’s escalator abruptly? UN clarifies; WH smells suspicion
content: The mystery of the UN General Assembly escalator malfunction during President Trump's visit has been solved. A UN spokesperson revealed that Trump's cameraman, walking backward to film the couple, triggered a safety mechanism, halting the escalator. While Trump joked about the incident, the White House initiated an investigation, demanding accountability if intentional interference was found.

title: Arjun turns 26: 'Lucky to have you as our son' — Sachin's emotional wish
content: Sachin Tendulkar shared a heartfelt birthday message for his son Arjun, celebrating his 26th birthday and expressing pride in his growth. Arjun recently got engaged and marked his return to cricket by dismissing Samit Dravid. Representing Goa, Arjun's career shows promise with notable performances in first-class cricket and an IPL debut, balancing personal milestones with his evolving cricketing journey.

title: Barack Obama meets a 102-year-old: Simple food secrets; longevity lessons go viral
content: Barack Obama shared a delightful moment on X, meeting a vibrant 102-year-old woman and humorously inquiring about her longevity secrets. Her reply, citing greens, cornbread, and bacon, sparked widespread joy and discussion. The interaction highlighted the importance of simple pleasures, routine, and social connection alongside healthy eating for a long and fulfilling life.

title: 'Denied flats for decades': CBI flags instances of bank-builder nexus
content: The Supreme Court has directed the CBI to file FIRs in six cases concerning builder-bank collusion, where subvention schemes were misused, resulting in the exploitation and defrauding of numerous homebuyers who were denied their flats for years. This order follows the CBI's preliminary investigation into 21 housing projects and 19 banks, revealing cognizable offenses. Supertech alone secured over Rs 5,157 crore from banks and financial institutions since 1998.

title: Puja Khedkar's parents absconding: LOC issued; may have fled country after abduction case
content: Navi Mumbai police have issued a lookout circular for Dilip Khedkar, his wife Manorama, and an unidentified individual in connection with a road rage kidnapping case. The case involves the abduction of a truck helper, Prahlad Chauhan, following a minor traffic incident. Dilip's chauffeur has already been arrested.

title: 'Let Jimmy Kimmel rot in bad ratings': Trump questions ABC's decision to bring him back
content: Donald Trump has reignited his feud with ABC and Jimmy Kimmel following the revival of 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' after its suspension due to controversial remarks about Charlie Kirk's death. Trump criticized Kimmel as 'Democrat garbage,' accusing ABC of illegal campaign contributions and threatened to 'test' the network.

title: Outrage over Autism claims: Trump's Tylenol comments spark backlash; internet reacts
content: Tennis legend Martina Navratilova has strongly criticized Donald Trump and Robert F. Kennedy Jr. for their controversial remarks linking Tylenol to autism. During a White House press event, Trump suggested a connection between medicine and rising autism rates, a claim Kennedy supported. Navratilova swiftly condemned their statements on social media, highlighting the lack of scientific evidence.

title: Gold price prediction today: Will it continue to hit new lifetime highs in near-term?
content: Gold price prediction: Gold prices are predicted to potentially correct, but the downside is expected to be limited, with a continued bull run anticipated. Factors driving this include festive demand in India, a weaker US dollar, safe-haven appeal amid economic uncertainty, and strong investment flows into gold ETFs.

title: Hasaranga fires back at Abrar in animated Asia Cup send-off war - Watch
content: In an Asia Cup Super Four match, Pakistan defeated Sri Lanka amidst a celebration battle between Abrar Ahmed and Wanindu Hasaranga. Abrar mocked Hasaranga's signature move after dismissing him, which Hasaranga returned by imitating Abrar's celebration upon taking crucial wickets. Pakistan's Hussain Talat shone with both bat and ball, securing a five-wicket victory.

title: 'Suspected affair': Man stabs wife 11 times to death in public view;
content: In Bengaluru, Lohithashwa, 43, surrendered to police after fatally stabbing his 32-year-old wife, Rekha, a telecaller, near Sunkadakatte. Rekha, previously married with two daughters, married Lohithashwa a few months ago. He suspected her of infidelity and was upset that she wouldn't send her daughters away.

title: Indian-origin CEOs take charge: Gopalan at T-Mobile; Goyal at Molson Coors
content: Amidst H-1B visa debates, Srinivas Gopalan and Rahul Goyal have been appointed as CEOs of T-Mobile and Molson Coors, respectively, in 2025. These appointments highlight the increasing influence of Indian-origin executives in major US corporations. Their leadership signifies the continued importance of skilled immigrants in shaping corporate America despite evolving immigration policies.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens in red; BSE Sensex down 250 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in red on Wednesday on weak global cues. While Nifty50 was below 25,100, BSE Sensex was down over 200 points.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for September 24- check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Mehul Kothari from Anand Rathi Shares recommends buying Greaves Cotton, Vadilal Industries, and Capri Global. Greaves Cotton shows a symmetrical triangle breakout with a target of ₹275. Vadilal Industries exhibits an inverse head and shoulder breakout, aiming for ₹7,000. Capri Global presents a range breakout with momentum confirmation, targeting ₹215.

title: 'Putin was lying to Trump': Zelenskyy reacts to US president's U-turn on Russia war
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy expressed surprise at Donald Trump's changed stance on the Russia war, noting improved relations between the US and Ukraine. Zelenskyy believes that President Putin's repeated dishonesty towards Trump has strengthened the bond between their nations. He highlighted enhanced intelligence coordination as crucial for battlefield decisions.

title: Prime accused in Assam Rifles’ convoy ambush in Manipur arrested, arms recovered
content: At the spot examination, the prime accused admitted that he is a bailed-out member of the banned People’s Liberation Army (PLA).

title: NIA books designated terrorist Pannun over his call to stop PM Modi from hoisting flag on August 15
content: Pannun allegedly attempted to instigate Sikh soldiers to stop PM Modi from hoisting the national flag at Red Fort, for which he offered a ₹11-crore reward

title: Zubeen Garg death: Assam prohibits North East India Festival organiser Shyamkanu Mahanta from holding any event in State
content: Garg’s sudden demise sent shockwaves across Assam, with many demanding an independent inquiry into the matter

title: Won't order listing of case on same day unless someone to be hanged: Supreme Court Judge Surya Kant
content: Justice Kant's remarks came when an advocate, Shobha Gupta, mentioned that a residential house in Rajasthan will be auctioned today and hence be listed today itself

title: 2030 Commonwealth Games: India presents proposal to host Games in Ahmedabad
content: The Indian team was led by Gujarat's Minister of Sports, Harsh Sanghavi, and the Indian Olympic Association (IOA) president, P.T. Usha

title: Telangana HC suspends single judge order in Group-I exam; posts matter  to October 15 for detailed hearing
content: After hearing contentions of the counsels of both the sides, the bench directed all of them to file written submissions by October 10

title: Kerala Devaswom Minister hails ‘constructive’ role of NSS, rejects BJP-RSS suggestion on Vavar at Sabarimala
content: V.N. Vasavan welcomes the community organisation’s support for recent Global Ayyappa Sangamam organised by TDB

title: Madras High Court judge recuses from hearing case filed by Minister Duraimurugan
content: Justice M. Dhandapani says, he had appeared for the Minister during his stint as a lawyer and therefore, does not want to hear the present case

title: School bus rams wall in Kerala, 20 students injured
content: Driver tells police that the vehicle was going down an incline when it experienced mechanical failure and rammed the compound wall of a house

title: Nowadays, a few States want to dilute Governor’s authority: Dharmendra Pradhan
content: Further, the Union Education Minister said, “Opposition against National Education Policy is political”

title: Actor Sonu Sood appears before ED in 1xBet betting app linked money laundering case
content: The federal probe agency has questioned former cricketers Suresh Raina, Shikhar Dhawan, Robin Uthappa and Yuvraj Singh over the last few weeks as part of the 1xBet betting app case probe

title: What are personality rights and how have courts shielded Indian celebrities
content: Experts told The Hindu that legislative intervention is urgently needed to end reliance on piecemeal judicial precedents in enforcing personality rights

title: U.S. firm HCA Healthcare opens its first GCC in Hyderabad
content: Minister Sridhar Babu inaugurates the centre, which has its office in more than 4 lakh sq ft facility, entail $75 million in investment and employ 3,000 people by 2026

title: Uppada fishermen’s issues to be addressed by government committee: Pawan Kalyan
content: A special committee will be constituted to focus on resolving immediate issues, improving livelihoods, and developing infrastructure in coastal villages

title: CM Fadnavis, deputies to visit flood-hit Marathwada; Ajit Pawar assures Govt help to rain-hit farmers in Maharashtra
content: Maharashtra Congress spokesperson, Sachin Sawant, targeted the Government, saying it has announced ₹2,215 crore in assistance to 31.64 lakh farmers affected by heavy rainfall.

title: Smuggling of luxury cars from Bhutan into Kerala likely to face wider probe by Central agencies
content: Customs authorities are set to share details of violations with relevant agencies – ED, NIA, MVD, and GST – paving the way for a multi-agency, nationwide investigation as these vehicles are believed to have been sold in more States

title: H-1B visa | The Hindu’s coverage on U.S. work immigration visa fee hike and its impact
content: Reports, analysis, explainers, videos, podcasts and more on America’s H-1B visa amid the new regulations imposed by the Trump administration

title: Road crash in J&K’s Poonch leaves five Army personnel injured
content: The Army personnel suffered minor injuries in the accident and were shifted to Sub-district hospital Mendhar

title: 7-year-old girl dies while undergoing treatment in Rachakonda, parents allege negligence
content: She was taken to a local practitioner who holds a Bachelor of Homeopathic Medicine and Surgery (BHMS) degree and practices homeopathy, according to an officer

title: External Affairs Minister Jaishankar calls for stronger Global South solidarity, collective push for United Nations reform
content: Mr. Jaishankar made the remarks at a high-level meeting of Like-Minded Global South countries in New York on September 24

title: SIR disruptive, may trigger mass disenfranchisement, vote theft, alleges CPI(ML) General Secretary
content: Speaking on Prashant Kishor’s Jan Suraaj Party, Dipankar Bhattacharya said that “a new party launched with so much money and media power is rare. Next to the BJP, it may be the strongest in terms of resources”

title: KSRTC bus collides with truck in Kerala capital, 12 injured
content: Following the collision, both drivers were trapped inside their vehicles for about half an hour. A Fire and Rescue Services team rescued them

title: 'Vote chori', Trump's tariffs to figure in CWC meeting in Patna: Bihar Congress Chief Rajesh Kumar
content: The State party chief bristled at the BJP-led NDA’s charge that the Congree Working Committee meeting “has always been held in Delhi, but now scheduled in the Bihar capital as a tactic”

title: Kolkata rains: City gradually returning to normalcy after rain fury, several areas remain waterlogged
content: The Met department has ruled out heavy rain in the city during the next 24 hours, though it forecast mostly cloudy skies with light to moderate showers

title: India close partner of U.S., but Trump imposed additional tariff for purchasing Russian oil: Rubio
content: The U.S. Secretary of State was responding to a question that Donald Trump has "repeatedly threatened" to take action against Vladimir Putin but backed off those threats

title: Lessons from the history of rebellions in AIADMK and DMK
content: With discomfort in the AIADMK showing no signs of subsiding, after former School Education Minister and veteran leader K.A. Sengottaiyan was divested of party posts following his call for the return of estranged leaders, it is a timely moment to revisit some of the most significant uprisings within Tamil Nadu’s two major Dravidian parties

title: Delhi Police Scans Over 200 CCTVs In Hit-And-Run Case, Accused Arrested
content: The Delhi Police have successfully cracked a blind hit-and-run case after eight days of intensive investigation, arresting the accused and recovering the offending vehicle.

title: Statehood Protesters Clash With Cops In Ladakh, Police Vehicle Burnt Down
content: Angry protesters clashed with the police in Leh city of Ladakh this morning, pelting stones at officials and even burning down a police vehicle, in the first such instance of violence during the ongoing statehood movement.

title: Experts Explain Rapture Belief Amid Viral Apocalyptic Prediction
content: The Rapture is near - at least according to an apocalyptic prophecy by one South African man who says it will fall on September 23 or 24.

title: Online Auction Of Gifts PM Modi Received, Proceeds To Go For Namami Gange
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday asked citizens to take part in an auction of gifts he had received. The proceeds from the auction will go towards the Namami Gange project, PM Modi said.

title: 99.99 Percentile In NEET But Didn't Want To Be Doctor. Teen Dies By Suicide
content: A 19-year-old student from Maharashtra's Chandrapur district died by suicide on the day he was scheduled to leave for admission to a medical college.

title: Laid Off By DOGE, Trump Administration Calls Federal Employees Back To Work
content: Hundreds of federal employees who lost their jobs in Elon Musk's cost-cutting blitz are being asked to return to work.

title: Jimmy Kimmel's Big Dig At Trump Over Epstein Files As Show Returns To Air
content: TV show host Jimmy Kimmel on Tuesday launched a fiery attack on US President Donald Trump over the administration's alleged "bullying" and efforts to curb free speech.

title: Video: Road Collapse In Bangkok Creates Massive Sinkhole, Traffic Disrupted
content: A part of a road in Bangkok collapsed on Wednesday, leaving a large sinkhole that disrupted traffic, damaged infrastructure and prompted evacuations in the surrounding area.

title: Opinion: Opinion | The Real Reason Behind Trump's Change Of Heart For TikTok
content: If the agreement eventually fructifies, then it gives us an indication into the thinking of Trump 2.0 with respect to economic security being a key element of national security.

title: 1940 To 2025: All That Has Changed Between 2 Congress Meetings In Bihar
content: The Congress's who's who, from party chief Mallikarjun Kharge to Leader of the Opposition in the Lok Sabha, Rahul Gandhi, to all Congress chief ministers, are meeting at Patna's Sadaqat Ashram today.

title: Video: Floodwater Breaks Hotel Door As Super Typhoon Ragasa Hits Hong Kong
content: After leaving deadly destruction in Taiwan and Philippines, Super Typhoon Ragasa, one of the strongest in years to hit East Asia, brought in waves taller than lampposts onto Hong Kong's shores early on Wednesday as it halted life in parts of China.

title: New BAPS Temple Revives Nagara-Style Architecture, Made With Jodhpur Sandstone
content: The BAPS Swaminarayan Mandir in Rajasthan's Jodhpur was inaugurated on Thursday. The temple is envisioned as a sanctuary of devotion, peace, and cultural pride.

title: Saudi Arabia's Grand Mufti Who Oversaw Era Of Liberal Reforms Dies At 80
content: Sheikh Abdulaziz bin Abdullah al-Sheikh, Saudi Arabia's grand mufti who served the kingdom's top religious figure over a quarter century that saw the ultraconservative Muslim nation socially liberalize, died Tuesday. He was in his 80s.

title: New Revelation In Dulquer Salmaan's Luxury Car Tax Evasion Case
content: Dulquer Salmaan's Toyota Land Cruiser is registered in the name of another person, said sources, as the Malayalam superstar faces probe for luxury car tax evasion.

title: Trump Says Ukraine Could "Take Back" Its Territory From Russia
content: US President Donald Trump said Tuesday that Ukraine could retake all of its territory from Russia -- and even go further -- in a major shift from his previous dismissals of Kyiv's war aims.

title: "All States In Himalayan Region Facing Existential Crisis": Supreme Court
content: All states in the Himalayan region are facing a serious existential crisis, the top court said today and posed several questions to the Himachal Pradesh government on its policies to regulate tourism, construction, and mining.

title: Video: Shubhanshu Shukla Explains Space Life In Perpetual Free Fall
content: Indian astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla has shown the world what "falling forever" looks like in space. In a video, he offered a peek into life aboard the International Space Station (ISS).

title: 1.9 Million On Instagram Followed Her Cancer Journey. At 14, She's Dead
content: Zuza Beine would create "Get Ready With Me (GRWM)" videos for Instagram. She would talk about her daily routine and share treatment updates while demonstrating skincare, makeup, or hairstyles in front of the camera.

title: "No Longer Seeking Differential Rights": China Ends Special WTO Benefits, Easing US Tensions
content: China will no longer claim the benefits available to developing nations at the World Trade Organization, removing a point of contention with the US that's been a barrier to their agreement on reforming the global arbiter of commerce.

title: 'Indians In Germany Earn More': Envoy's Migration Call Amid H-1B Visa Row
content: As chaos shrouds the United States' H-1B visa programme following Team Trump's $100,000 fee hike, Germany is seizing the moment to attract Indian professionals.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Saudi clubs still insistent on Fernandes
content: Saudi Pro League clubs are reportedly linked to a move for Manchester United midfielder Bruno Fernandes. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Should you draft Cooper Flagg in the third round?
content: Our experts weigh in on the No. 1 pick of the 2025 NBA draft and what type of fantasy production they expect out of him as a rookie.

title: Fantasy basketball: Sleepers, breakouts and busts for 2025-26
content: Which fantasy basketball players are going to exceed expectations in 2025-26? Our experts list their picks.

title: Sleepers and busts: Who to draft and who to avoid at current value
content: Here are the best fantasy hockey sleeper picks to draft, as well as which players to avoid at current rankings.

title: Plant my flag list: Greg Wyshynski's 10 must-draft players
content: Greg Wyshynski reveals the 10 players he's queuing up in every one of his fantasy hockey drafts this season.

title: How an auto driver helped bust child trafficking ring in Tamil Nadu 16 years ago
content: The first tip-off came from an alert auto driver in Tiruchi who led the police to unravel a gang involved in abduction and illegal adoption of babies

title: IPR Gandhinagar team proposes roadmap for India’s fusion power plans
content: Controlled fusion can only happen in extreme conditions, the kinds that exist inside stars. There are currently two popular ways to achieve this: inertial confinement and magnetic confinement. India is already invested in the magnetic confinement technique as a member of the ITER project, which is building a reactor in France

title: Closed-door hearing on Panvel ward delimitation triggers complaint
content: Citizens, organisations allege denial of participation in process; formal complaint filed with Election Commission demanding open and transparent hearing.

title: No ban on meat, egg sale in Bhopal during Navratri, officials deny news reports
content: Speaking to The Hindu, Bhopal Collector Kaushalendra Vikram Singh said, “No such order has been issued by the district administration placing a blanket ban like this.”

title: Main accused in Uttarakhand SSSC question paper leak case arrested
content: Chief Minister Pushkar Singh Dhami reiterated that those involved in exam malpractices will not be spared under any circumstances.

title: Sand, debris that accumulate on Chennai roads are not being cleared properly: residents
content: They say that this is posing risk to motorists and causing inconvenience to pedestrians; they urge Greater Chennai Corporation to clear the stretches before the onset of Northeast monsoon

title: 15,000 tonnes of steel to be used in Saidapet-Teynampet elevated corridor: Highways Minister
content: After completion, the elevated corridor is expected to cut down the travel time on this stretch from 40 minutes to just 10 minutes

title: Highways Department to deploy pumps to 54 flood-prone spots on roads across Chennai
content: It has also started desilting its 624-km storm-water drain network under way within in the city limits

title: ‘Operation Lungs’: YSRCP calls eviction of vendors in Vizag ‘illegal’, submits memo to GVMC
content: Claiming that 40,000 families have lost their livelihood after the anti-encroachment drive, YSRCP demands compensation for the affected vendors

title: CPI(M) condemns A.P. govt. move to increase working hours for labourers
content: The NDA government is favouring investors at the cost of workers’ interests, alleges CPI(M) State Secretary Srinivas Rao

title: Compensation for onion crops should reach tenant farmers, says APTFA
content: Many onion farmers have not been issued tenant recognition cards due to restrictive provisions in AP Crop Cultivators Rights Act, it says

title: IMD warns of heavy rain in Andamans due to cyclonic circulation
content: Local port warnings have been issued in the wake of the weather system, which is likely to cause heavy rainfall till September 25

title: Watch: From villain to legend: Mohanlal wins Dadasaheb Phalke Award
content: Malayalam superstar Mohanlal has been honoured with the Dadasaheb Phalke Award at the 71st National Film Awards, recognising his extraordinary four-decade career spanning nearly 400 films across five languages.

title: Allahabad High Court stays EOW probe against 558 aided madrassas in Uttar Pradesh
content: The petition added that the Act clearly states that the commission shall not inquire into any matter after the expiry of one year

title: Rain a routine fear in Hyderabad’s flood-prone Hakeempet
content: The area’s steep gradient, with sharp drops in elevation, funnels rainwater at destructive speed while narrow drains and unplanned construction block natural flow; even brief rain spells often turn the streets into torrents

title: Supreme Court directs Himachal Pradesh government to be clear on its disaster management measures
content: The order comes against the backdrop of landslides and flash floods which have wrecked the State. In a series of questions, the top court has directed the State government to place on record various details, including on green cover and zoning, if any, done on the basis of seismic activity/ landslides/ green cover/ eco-sensitivity

title: Incessant rain, waterlogging in Kolkata leaves Durga Puja pandals damaged, submerged in water
content: Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee cancelled her Durga Puja pandal inauguration programme on Tuesday, and asked people to remain alert

title: CPI vows solidarity with Palestinian, flags GST and flood related issues
content: The party urged the Government of India to vote consistently in support of Palestine at the United Nations and to extend humanitarian assistance to Palestinians

title: Constitution Bench links sense of ‘stagnation’ in lower judiciary to prolonged litigation
content: The Supreme Court is hearing a reference on whether judicial officers with seven years’ legal experience can avail Bar quota for District Judge appointment

title: CM Siddaramaiah writes to Wipro seeking to access link road within their campus for traffic to decongest ORR
content: A detailed traffic simulation study by Bengaluru Traffic Police has projected that opening of the Wipro–Ecoworld campus link road to the public could reduce travel time along the Sarjapur Road–Outer Ring Road corridor by nearly 38%.

title: Indian Navy chief calls on Sri Lankan PM in Colombo
content: Four-day official visit to the island nation to further deepen bilateral naval ties, and explore opportunities for cooperation in the Indian Ocean Region

title: Fresh norms soon to curb road collapses in hilly areas
content: Move comes after several highway sections were washed away following cloudbursts and floods in Himachal Pradesh and Uttarakhand

title: Last day for KNRUHS UG counselling under management quota on Wednesday
content: The candidates who have been shortlisted can participate in the web counseling round, which will remain open until September 24, till 2 p.m.

title: Bihar polls: INDIA bloc to release manifesto for Extremely Backward Classes
content: The manifesto is likely to include a promise to bring a law for the EBCs on similar lines as the Scheduled Castes and the Scheduled Tribes (Prevention of Atrocities) Act.

title: Don’t let boundary issue of the past define current India-China ties: Chinese envoy
content: At National Day function,  Xu Feihong says trade between the two countries is up 10%, while 2,65,000 visas were issued to Indians this year

title: Rajnath Singh inaugurates India’s first overseas defence facility in Morocco
content: The facility will produce the indigenously developed Wheeled Armoured Platform (WhAP) 8x8, jointly designed by TASL and India’s Defence Research and Development Organisation

title: India to submit updated carbon-reduction targets by the beginning of COP30 on November 10
content: The Nationally Determined Contributions (NDCs) are renewable-energy adoption goals set by a country as part of being a signatory to the Paris Agreement – under which countries must regulate their fossil fuel consumption to keep the globe from heating 2°C, and as far as possible, 1.5°C above that in pre-industrial times.

title: 59,724 seats remain vacant in professional courses in Karnataka this year, up from 51,105 seats last year
content: A total of 1,51,593 seats were available for professional courses under the government quota this year

title: Andhra Pradesh Assembly passes Bill for Sub-Classification of Scheduled Castes to ensure fair reservation distribution
content: The legislation formalises the Governor’s 2025 ordinance, dividing the State’s 59 Scheduled Castes into three groups. It follows a Supreme Court ruling upholding sub-classification and aims to provide equitable access to education and public employment

title: NIA books Pannun over call to Sikh soldiers to 'stop' PM from hoisting national flag
content: Bharti Jain is senior editor with the Times of India, new Delhi . she has been writing on security matters since 1996 . her repertoire of news stories delves into the whole gamut of issues related to terrorism and internal strife .

title: Ten years of Kirby Smart at Georgia
content: a stranger approached a football coach to share a story about her daughter . she stepped outside to hear smart screaming at his players through a microphone during practice . the woman said she felt so much better that she wasn't in football practice, she said .

title: WWE Raw takeaways: Are Ripley and Sky WWE's new odd couple? Can Vaquer keep ascending?
content: the first Raw after Wrestlepalooza left the landmark event firmly in the rearview mirror . attention turned to building the card for crown jewel in Perth, Australia, on Oct. 11 . newly minted women's world champion Stephanie Vaquer delivered a heartfelt promo after it was announced she would square off with the winner of this Friday's triple-threat match .

title: What makes Barcelona's Ballon d'Or winners Bonmati and Lopez so special?
content: the ballon d'Or is one of the most prestigious individual awards in football, given to the best men's and women's player of the last year . the award was won by winger Vicky López ahead of real madrid's Linda Caicedo and Chelsea's Wieke Kaptein .

title: Barnwell: Ranking Week 3's most infuriating losses, starting with the Packers' massive upset
content: a few teams went home feeling as if they were robbed or threw away a game in which they were the better team . the four most agonizing losses of week 3 hit another level . let's pick the most enraging defeats of the week .

title: Congress holds CWC meeting in Bihar; BJP takes 'lathbandhan' jibe
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics .

title: No, Indiana football hasn't really beaten anyone, but what if it's for real?
content: Indiana dropped 35 first-half points against a top-10 opponent previously hyped for its defense . a 63-10 annihilation of the no. 9-ranked Illini, a prime-tieti-ranked, was a show of force against the top-10 . the former mausoleum known as IU's Memorial Stadium is a combination of delirium and disbelief .

title: MLB playoff pressure rankings: Which World Series contenders must win now -- or else?
content: the Padres beat the Brewers 5-4 in the playoffs . the answer is a little different for every team, and the force of that pressure changes with each passing season . only the faithful are in a state of pure release, because L.A. won last year .

title: Micah Parsons isn't the first player Jerry Jones talked contracts with -- he won't be last
content: it has been a common practice for Jones and executive vice president Stephen Jones over the years to engage with their star players in hopes of convincing them to sign a new deal . there is nothing in the collective bargaining agreement that explicitly prevents the discussions . several agents said it is not a good look to circumvent them and go to the player who might not know all the details .

title: Futures of Giants' Brian Daboll, Joe Schoen hinge on Jaxson Dart's instant success
content: the new york Giants will start rookie quarterback Jaxson Dart in week 4 . the decision came down after coach Brian Daboll left the door open to a change on Monday . he will start until the Giants couldn't justify him being the starter .
